lines.text: I hope you're not going to fool around because I have a lot of things to do.
You mean Miss Twinkle Tits in banking?
A long time ago I worked for the CIA.
Did you kill people?
You speak French?
They gave us new papers, new jobs, new names. The works... everything.
New names?
Yeha.
Oh, Oh. Wait a minute. We were at the hotel and Taber asked you, "What name?" This is not my name? What's my name?
Derek, Derek Potter. I'm Duncan. This is where the "Duke" comes from.

[talking to Clay about one of his agents]
Where did you recruit him? In the Sears catalog?
Welcome to Berlin! Are you here for -business or pleasure?
Funeral.

[to Mason]
If you love Jesus, honk your horn.

[to Mason]
Do yourself a favor and take the rest of your life off. If I see you again ... I won't see you again.
an agent's family was sacred.
And you broke that rule!
No! Not me, not my people. I checked them out, every one of them. I held my own investigation.
I evacuate myself on your investigation!

[in East Germany]
If I want to worry, I'll worry; free fucking country, right?
Son of a bitch! Can't you leave this family alone?
Look, I don't know who you were in the old days but don't you think I should do the driving now?
Just don't worry, okay? I think I can handle.
Alright. Here we go to Hamburg at 20 miles an hour.
Tourists? We're not talkng about tourists here, we're talking about mom! And I know you, you don't drink unless you're nervous.
